data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.BackColor.Description
data.value: Specifies the background color.

data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.BorderColor.Description
data.value: Specifies the border color.

data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.BorderWidth.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the border width.

data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.Font.Description
data.value: Specifies the font used to render the text.

data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.ForeColor.Description
data.value: Specifies the foreground color.

data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.TextHorizontalAlignment.Description
data.value: Specifies the horizontal alignment of the appearance object’s text.

data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.TextVerticalAlignment.Description
data.value: Gets the vertical alignment of the appearance object’s text.

data.name: DevExpress.PivotGrid.Printing.PrintAppearanceObject.WordWrap.Description
data.value: Specifies whether or not to wrap the text.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.BaseFilter.Criteria.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a filter criteria applied to data displayed in the Pivot Grid.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.BaseFilter.Enabled.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to apply a filter criteria specified using BaseFilter.Criteria or BaseFilter.CriteriaString.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridCustomTotalBase.CellFormat.Description
data.value: Provides the settings used to format the custom total’s values.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridCustomTotalBase.Format.Description
data.value: Provides the settings used to format the text within the custom total’s headers.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridCustomTotalBase.SummaryType.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the summary function used to calculate the current custom total.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridCustomTotalBase.Tag.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with the custom total.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.AllowedAreas.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the areas within which the field can be positioned.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.Area.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the area in which the field is displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.AreaIndex.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field’s index from among the other fields displayed within the same area.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.AutoPopulatedProperties.Description
data.value: Get or set a collection of OLAP member properties.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.CalculateHiddenSummaries.Description
data.value: Allows you to calculate summary values for hidden data fields.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.Caption.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field’s display caption.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.CellFormat.Description
data.value: Provides access to the format settings applied to cells.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.ColumnValueLineCount.Description
data.value: If the current field is displayed in the Column Header Area, this property gets or sets the height of the field’s values, in text lines.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.DataBinding.Description
data.value: Gets or sets an object that specifies the Pivot Grid field’s source data.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.DisplayFolder.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the folder containing the field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.EmptyCellText.Description
data.value: Gets the text displayed by an empty cell.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.EmptyValueText.Description
data.value: Gets the text used for an empty field value header.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.ExpandedInFieldsGroup.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the expansion status of the current field if it belongs to a field group.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.FieldName.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the database field that is assigned to the current PivotGridFieldBase object.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.GrandTotalCellFormat.Description
data.value: Provides access to the format settings applied to grand total values.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.GrandTotalText.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within the Grand Total‘s header that corresponds to the current field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.GroupInterval.Description
data.value: Gets or sets how the values of the current column or row field are combined into groups.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.GroupIntervalNumericRange.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the length of the intervals when values are grouped together.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.KPIGraphic.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a graphic set used to indicate KPI values.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.MinWidth.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of columns that correspond to the current field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.OLAPDimensionCaption.Description
data.value: Specifies the OLAP dimension’s caption displayed in the Customization form’s field list.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.OLAPExpression.Description
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate values for the current unbound field in OLAP.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.Options.Description
data.value: Contains the field’s options.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.RowValueLineCount.Description
data.value: If the current field is displayed in the Row Header Area, this property gets or sets the height of the field’s values, in text lines.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.RunningTotal.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether Running totals are calculated for values in the Data Area that correspond to the current column or row field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.ShowNewValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values that have appeared in the datasource after the field’s filtering was configured should be shown.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.SortByAttribute.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the OLAP member property name by which the pivot grid’s data is sorted.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.SortBySummaryInfo.Description
data.value: Contains the settings used to sort the values of the current column field or row field by summary values in rows/columns.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.SortMode.Description
data.value: Gets or sets how the field’s data is sorted.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.SortOrder.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field’s sort order.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.SummaryDisplayType.Description
data.value: Gets or sets how a summary value calculated against the current data field is represented in a cell.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.SummaryType.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the summary function which is calculated against the current data field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.Tag.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with the field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.TopValueCount.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the absolute or relative number of field values that should be displayed for the current column field or row field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.TopValueMode.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether top n values for a specified data field are calculated based on all data source records or in the parent category.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.TopValueShowOthers.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the “Others” item is displayed within the Pivot Grid when the Top X Value feature is enabled.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.TopValueType.Description
data.value: Gets or sets how the number of Top Values is determined.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.TotalCellFormat.Description
data.value: Provides access to the format settings applied to total cells.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.TotalsVisibility.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display totals for the current field when it is in the Column Header Area or Row Header Area and if so, whether they are automatic or custom.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.TotalValueFormat.Description
data.value: Provides access to the format settings applied to the total header.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.UnboundExpression.Description
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate the unbound field’s value.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.UnboundExpressionMode.Description
data.value: Gets or sets how the specified data field’s unbound expression is calculated.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.UnboundFieldName.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the name of a column in a summary data source that corresponds to the current unbound field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.UnboundType.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field’s data type and binding mode.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.UseNativeFormat.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the current field’s data format when the Pivot Grid Control is exported in XLS/XLSX formats.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.ValueFormat.Description
data.value: Provides access to the format settings applied to field values.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.Visible.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field is visible.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldBase.Width.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the width of columns that correspond to the current field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowDrag.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to drag the Field Header.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowDragInCustomizationForm.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to drag field headers between areas in the Customization Form.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowExpand.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to expand/collapse the rows or columns which correspond to the current field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowFilter.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can apply a filter to the current field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowFilterBySummary.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to filter pivot grid data by summaries calculated against the current data field.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowRunTimeSummaryChange.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can change the data field’s summary type.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowSort.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can modify the field’s current sort order.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.AllowSortBySummary.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort the current row/column field values by other column/row summary values.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.GroupFilterMode.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the filtering mode used for the field’s owner group.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.HideEmptyVariationItems.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the first (empty) column/row that displays variation data for the current data field must be hidden.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.OLAPFilterByUniqueName.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether PivotGridControl should take into account OLAP member values or unique names when filtering data in an OLAP mode.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.OLAPFilterUsingWhereClause.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the WHERE or subselect clause in an MDX query, when filtering against filter fields in OLAP mode.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.OLAPUseNonEmpty.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the NonEmpty function should be used in MDX queries for the current measure.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowCustomTotals.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether Custom Totals that correspond to the current Column Field or Row Field are visible.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowGrandTotal.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether grand totals that correspond to the current data field are visible.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowGroupIntervalName.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display a group interval name in the field header.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowInCustomizationForm.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field’s header is displayed within the customization form when the field is hidden.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowInExpressionEditor.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current field is available in the Expression Editor‘s field list.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowSummaryTypeName.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the summary type is displayed within the data field’s header.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowTotals.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether Totals that correspond to the current data field are visible.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldOptions.ShowValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether data cells that correspond to the current data field are visible.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfo.Conditions.Description
data.value: Contains conditions that identify the column or row whose values are sorted.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfo.CustomTotalSummaryType.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the summary type of the custom total column/row, by which the current field values are sorted.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfo.Field.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field whose summary values define the order in which the values of the current column field or row field are arranged.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfo.FieldName.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field name of the field whose summary values define the order in which the values of the current column field or row field are arranged.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfo.SummaryType.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the summary function type used to calculate the summary values which define the order in which the current column field’s (row field’s) values are arranged.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortCondition.Field.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field to which the condition corresponds.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortCondition.OLAPUniqueMemberName.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the unique name of the corresponding OLAP member.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridFieldSortCondition.Value.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the field value represented by the condition.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.AllowCrossGroupVariation.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether summary variations and running totals are calculated independently within individual groups, or throughout the Pivot Grid.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.AutoExpandGroups.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values are expanded or collapsed by default.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.CaseSensitive.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether data is grouped case-sensitively.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.DataFieldUnboundExpressionMode.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether unbound expressions for pivot grid’s data fields are calculated based on the data source records or summary values.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.DataProcessingEngine.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the engine used to perform data processing (aggregation, summarization, etc.) in the pivot grid.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.DirectDataAccessInClientMode.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the calculation engine bypasses the creation of temporary storage for source data.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.DrillDownMaxRowCount.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows returned when obtaining underlying data.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.FilterByVisibleFieldsOnly.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to take into account filter conditions of visible filter fields only.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.OptimizeSummaryTypeCalculation.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use decimal type conversion while calculating data in certain aggregation types.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsData.RetrieveNestedFields.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to add nested fields when retrieving fields from the bound data source.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsDataField.Area.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the area in which the data field headers are displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsDataField.AreaIndex.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the data field headers.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsDataField.Caption.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within the data header.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsDataField.ColumnValueLineCount.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the height of data field headers, in text lines. This property is in effect when there are two or more data fields, and data field headers are displayed in the Column Header Area.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsDataField.FieldNaming.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the rule for naming columns, that correspond to data fields, when creating a data source via the CreateSummaryDataSource methods.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsDataField.RowHeaderWidth.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the data field headers when they are displayed as row headers.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsDataField.RowValueLineCount.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the height of data field headers, in text lines. This property is in effect when there are two or more data fields, and data field headers are displayed in the Row Header Area.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.ColumnFieldValueSeparator.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between the values of column fields when the pivot grid is printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.ColumnHeaderPaddingBottom.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the gap between the column header area and data area.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.FilterSeparatorBarPadding.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the vertical distance between filter field headers headers and the main part of the printed pivot grid.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.MergeColumnFieldValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the values of outer column fields are merged when a pivot grid is printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.MergeRowFieldValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the values of outer row fields are merged when a pivot grid is printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintColumnAreaOnEveryPage.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print column area on every page.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintColumnFieldValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether column field values are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintColumnHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether column field headers are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintDataHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether data field headers are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintFilterHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter field headers are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintHorzLines.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal grid lines are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintRowAreaOnEveryPage.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print row area on every page.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintRowFieldValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether row field values are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintRowHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether row field headers are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintUnusedFilterFields.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether unused filter fields are printed/exported.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.PrintVertLines.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical grid lines are printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsPrint.RowFieldValueSeparator.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between row field values when the pivot grid is printed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ColumnTotalsLocation.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the column totals’ location.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.GroupFieldsInCustomizationWindow.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether hidden fields are grouped within the Customization Form.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.RowTotalsLocation.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the totals’ and grand totals’ location.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.RowTreeOffset.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the tree offset.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.RowTreeWidth.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the innermost row field values.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowColumnGrandTotalHeader.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Grand Total column header is visible when there are two or more data fields.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowColumnGrandTotals.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display column Grand Totals.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowColumnHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowColumnTotals.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display column automatic Totals.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowCustomTotalsForSingleValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether custom totals are displayed for the field values which contain a single nesting field value.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowDataHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether data headers are displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowFilterHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter headers are displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowFilterSeparatorBar.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the horizontal line that separates the Filter Header Area from the Data Area and Column Header Area is displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowGrandTotalsForSingleValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether grand totals are displayed when the control lists a single value of an outer column field or row field along its left or top edge.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowHorzLines.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal grid lines are displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowRowGrandTotalHeader.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Grand Total row header is visible when there are two or more data fields.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowRowGrandTotals.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display row Grand Totals.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowRowHeaders.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether row headers are displayed.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowRowTotals.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display row automatic Totals.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowTotalsForSingleValues.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether automatic totals are displayed for the field values which contain a single nesting field value.

data.name: DevExpress.XtraPivotGrid.PivotGridOptionsViewBase.ShowVertLines.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical grid lines are displayed.
